page.title: 14Pets
page.content: Stuart and I are both{pet lovers.}I have got two{cats.}I did have four but Scratch died when it was run over by a car and Flopper died of old age. We both have a{dog.}Mine is a golden labrador called Pippa and Stuart has a mongrel called Dusty. Cats are more independent than dogs and only need feeding, but dogs are more fun to play with and take for walks. Stuart has two{goldfish.}I did have seven but they died from overfeeding! Stuart also has two{rabbits,}Buffy and Sooty,who have had fifteen babies!The worst part about cleaning out rabbit hutches is the awful pong! We don't have any other pets ourselves but some of our friends have {gerbils}and caged{birds}like budgerigars and we have a tank of {tropical fish}at school.
